segments.text: Mike , these flowers are just gorgeous .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m glad you like them . Happy birthday !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I can ’ t thank you enough . I ’ m really touched . I don ’ t know what to say .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Forget it . It ’ s my pleasure . You mean a lot to me .
segments.speaker: S2
